new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-09 12:00:00) positions.

Step 1 — Read yesterday’s positions and today’s prices (2025-10-09 12:00:00)
- Positions: NVDA 6, MSFT 2, AMZN 4, AMD 4, MU 6, MRVL 1, Cash $26.38
- Today’s buying prices used for valuation:
  - NVDA 194.17
  - MSFT 519.65
  - AMZN 223.955
  - AMD 233.89
  - MU 192.95
  - MRVL 91.7607

Step 2 — Update today’s valuation
- NVDA: 6 × 194.17 = 1,165.02
- MSFT: 2 × 519.65 = 1,039.30
- AMZN: 4 × 223.955 = 895.82
- AMD: 4 × 233.89 = 935.56
- MU: 6 × 192.95 = 1,157.70
- MRVL: 1 × 91.7607 = 91.76
- Cash: 26.38
- Total portfolio value: 5,311.54

Step 3 — Current portfolio weights
- NVDA: 1,165.02 / 5,311.54 = 21.94%
- MSFT: 1,039.30 / 5,311.54 = 19.56%
- AMZN: 895.82 / 5,311.54 = 16.86%
- AMD: 935.56 / 5,311.54 = 17.61%
- MU: 1,157.70 / 5,311.54 = 21.79%
- MRVL: 91.76 / 5,311.54 = 1.73%
- Cash: 26.38 / 5,311.54 = 0.50%
- Note: Semiconductor exposure (NVDA+AMD+MU+MRVL) ≈ 63.1%

Step 4 — Market checks and sentiment (X/Reddit/news)
- Semis/regulation: Ongoing chatter around potential tightening of U.S. export controls and China responses (Oct 9 updates summarize policy risk). This is a headline risk for AI/semis, but not a confirmed change today.
- HBM/AI supply chain: Continued industry discussion on HBM capacity expansion and AI infrastructure buildouts (supportive for MU and broader AI complex).
- AMZN retail event: Facteus posted a wrap-up for Fall Prime event (suggests measurable activity); details not fully visible via scraper, but implies consumer spend data tracked the event.
- MSFT/AI PC: Ongoing AI stack momentum commentary persists; no negative datapoint today via our pulls.
- No credible, same-day negative catalysts specific to our held tickers were found.

Step 5 — Decision and adjustments
- Constraints: Cash is minimal ($26.38), insufficient to add to core positions. Selling small lots (e.g., 1 share MRVL) would not fund a meaningful increase in core names (NVDA/AMD/MU/AMZN/MSFT) at current prices.
- Strategy: Maintain current allocation. Near-term catalysts include big-cap tech earnings later in October and macro (Sept CPI on Oct 24). Semi headline risk is noted, but AI demand and HBM trends remain supportive. No rebalance today.

Actions executed
- No trades executed. Positions remain unchanged.

Updated positions (unchanged)
- NVDA 6, MSFT 2, AMZN 4, AMD 4, MU 6, MRVL 1, Cash $26.38
- Total portfolio value: $5,311.54

Notes/Watchlist
- Monitor: U.S.-China export control developments; Sept CPI (Oct 24); earnings windows for MSFT/AMZN/AMD; MU industry commentary on HBM; NVDA supply cadence and hyperscaler capex updates.
- If volatility spikes on policy headlines without fundamental demand change, consider adding to MU/NVDA/AMD on weakness if cash is available.

<FINISH_SIGNAL>

URL: https://www.servethehome.com/amd-dives-deep-on-cdna-4-architecture-and-mi350-accelerator-at-hot-chips-2025/
Title: AMD Dives Deep on CDNA 4 Architecture and MI350 Accelerator at Hot Chips 2025
Description: 
Publish Time: 2025-08-27T00:16:21+00:00
Content: [![Image 1: AMD MI350 Accelerator](https://www.servethehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/HC-AMD-Instinct-MI350-Series-GPUs-and-Platforms-FINAL-6-696x392.jpg)](https://www.servethehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/HC-AMD-Instinct-MI350-Series-GPUs-and-Platforms-FINAL-6.jpg)

AMD MI350 Accelerator

The second big machine learning accelerator talk of the afternoon belongs to AMD. The company’s chip architects are at this year’s show to tell the audience all about the CDNA 4 architecture, which is powering AMD’s new MI350 family of accelerators.

Like it’s MI300 predecessor, AMD is using 3D die stacking to build up a formidable chip, layering up to 8 accelerator complex dies (XCDs) on top of a pair of I/O dies, making for a 185 billion transistor behemoth.

[![Image 2: Large Language Models: Explosive Growth](https://www.servethehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/HC-AMD-Instinct-MI350-Series-GPUs-and-Platforms-FINAL-2-800x450.jpg)](https://www.servethehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/...

URL: https://www.microsoft.com/investor/reports/ar25/index.html
Title: Microsoft 2025 Annual Report
Description: 
Publish Time: Thu, 16 Oct 2025 16:03:02 GMT
Content: Dear shareholders, colleagues, customers, and partners:

Fifty years after our founding, Microsoft is once again at the heart of a generational moment in technology as we find ourselves in the midst of the AI platform shift. More than any transformation before it, this generation of AI is radically changing every layer of the tech stack, and we are changing with it.

Across the company, we are accelerating our pace of innovation and adapting to both a new tech stack and a new way of working. We are delivering our current platforms at scale while building the next generation, always striving to create more value for our customers, our partners, and the world.

Striking this balance is hard work, and few companies over the years have been able to do it. To succeed, we must continue to think in decades but execute in quarters, approaching each day with the humility and curiosity required to continuously improve, while being guided by our bold vision for the future.

Financially, it was a ...

Title: SemiconductorJobs.com
Description: Lawmakers eye tighter chip tool controls, China expands rare earth limits, Amkor grows in Arizona, and AI demand drives foundry strength.
Publish Time: unknown
Content: Oct. 9, 2025

Today’s semiconductor update highlights new U.S. export control discussions, China’s response on rare earths, and continued momentum in Arizona’s growing chip ecosystem. AI demand and secure chip development also remain strong themes this week.

*   **Policy / Regulation**

 U.S. lawmakers are pushing to “dramatically expand” export controls on semiconductor manufacturing tools after a House Select Committee found China acquired $38 billion of such equipment despite existing restrictions. [InsideTrade+2Reuters+2](https://insidetrade.com/daily-news/select-panel-calls-drastic-expansion-export-controls-china?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

 In parallel, China unveiled broader rare earth export controls targeting semiconductor and defense users—adding fuel to global supply chain tension. [Reuters+2Bloomberg+2](https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-tightens-rare-earth-export-controls-2025-10-09/?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

URL: https://www.bls.gov/news.release/cpi.htm
Title: Consumer Price Index News Release
Description: 
Publish Time: unknown
Content: Transmission of material in this release is embargoed until                                        
8:30 a.m. (ET) Friday, October 24, 2025        USDL-25-1502
	
Contact information: (202) 691-5902  *  PressOffice@bls.gov 

CONSUMER PRICE INDEX - SEPTEMBER 2025

The Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers (CPI-U) increased 0.3 percent on a seasonally adjusted basis in
September, after rising 0.4 percent in August, the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reported today. Over the last 12
months, the all items index increased 3.0 percent before seasonal adjustment. Note that September CPI data collection
was completed before the lapse in appropriations. 

The index for gasoline rose 4.1 percent in September and was the largest factor in the all items monthly increase, as
the index for energy rose 1.5 percent over the month. The food index increased 0.2 percent over the month as the food
at home index rose 0.3 percent and the food away from home index increased 0.1 percent.

The index for...

[$IREN](https://x.com/search?q=%24IREN&src=cashtag_click) Executive management summary and rating. The senior management team is assessed as high-caliber operators with differentiated domain expertise in power-dense infrastructure, disciplined capital formation, and rapid scale execution, evidenced by simultaneous expansion in bitcoin hash rate and AI cloud capacity. Execution quality is reflected in FY25 financial and operational inflections and strengthened disclosure controls, while incentive alignment relies heavily on equity with explicit share-price hurdles. The principal yellow flags are outsized CEO grant values in FY25, the mid-year modification of performance RSUs to time-based vesting, and enduring governance concentration through B shares. Overall management quality rating: strong, with governance vigilance warranted given compensation design and voting control. Key investment implications include higher confidence in delivery of AI GPU...

URL: https://www.amd.com/en/newsroom/press-releases/2024-10-10-amd-delivers-leadership-ai-performance-with-amd-in.html
Title: AMD Delivers Leadership AI Performance with AMD Instinct MI325X Accelerators
Description: 
Publish Time: 2024-10-10T01:00:00
Content: _─ Latest accelerators offer market leading HBM3E memory capacity and are supported by partners and customers including Dell Technologies, HPE, Lenovo, Supermicro and others ─_

_─ AMD Pensando Salina DPU offers 2X generational performance and AMD Pensando Pollara 400 is industry’s first UEC ready NIC─_

SAN FRANCISCO, Oct. 10, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Today, [AMD](http://www.amd.com/)(NASDAQ: AMD) announced the latest accelerator and networking solutions that will power the next generation of AI infrastructure at scale: AMD Instinct™ MI325X accelerators, the AMD Pensando™ Pollara 400 NIC and the AMD Pensando Salina DPU. AMD Instinct MI325X accelerators set a new standard in performance for Gen AI models and data centers.

Built on the AMD CDNA™ 3 architecture, AMD Instinct MI325X accelerators are designed for exceptional performance and efficiency for demanding AI tasks spanning foundation model training, fine-tuning and inferencing. Together, these products enable AMD customers and p...

The biggest Amazon sale of the year next to Prime Day, Prime Big Deal Days are back this week with two full days of deals and sales. See below for everything you need to know about Prime Big Deal Days, plus our favorite picks for the best deals to shop today.

Don't have Prime? Sign up **[here](https://amzn.to/3Bt3CWS)**.

What are Amazon Prime Big Deal Days?
------------------------------------

Like July's Prime Day, Prime Big Deal Days is Amazon's biggest sale of the year, and it is filled with discounts across all categories including home, fashion, tech, beauty, furniture and more.

When is Prime Big Deal Days 2025?
---------------------------------

Prime Big Deal Days begins on Tuesday, October 7 and continues through Wednesday, October 8.
